scripts:
set properties on /content/dam/assignment/jcr:content
  set cq:conf{String} to /conf/assignment
  set jcr:title{String} to "Assignment"
end

set ACL for AEM_ASSIGNMENT_USER_GROUP
	allow jcr:read on /libs,/apps/wknd,/content
	deny jcr:all on /content restriction(rep:globs,/assignment,/outbound-marketing,/campaigns)
	deny jcr:all on /content/wknd restriction(rep:globs,/*)
	allow jcr:read on /content/wknd restriction(rep:globs,/jcr:content,/us,/ca)
	deny jcr:all on /content/wknd/ca restriction(rep:globs,/*)
	allow jcr:read on /content/wknd/ca restriction(rep:globs,/jcr:content,/en)
	deny jcr:all on /content/wknd/us restriction(rep:globs,/*)
	allow jcr:read on /content/wknd/us restriction(rep:globs,/jcr:content,/en)
	deny jcr:all on /content/wknd/ca/en restriction(rep:globs,/*)
	allow jcr:read,rep:write,crx:replicate on /content/wknd/ca/en restriction(rep:globs,/jcr:content,/magazine)
	deny jcr:all on /content/wknd/us/en restriction(rep:globs,/*)
	allow jcr:read,rep:write,crx:replicate on /content/wknd/us/en restriction(rep:globs,/jcr:content,/magazine)
end

set ACL for AEM_ASSIGNMENT_USER_GROUP
	deny jcr:all on /content/experience-fragments restriction(rep:globs,/*)
	allow jcr:read on /content/experience-fragments restriction(rep:globs,/wknd)
	deny jcr:all on /content/experience-fragments/wknd restriction(rep:globs,/*)
	allow jcr:read on /content/experience-fragments/wknd restriction(rep:globs,/us,/ca)
	deny jcr:all on /content/experience-fragments/wknd/us/en restriction(rep:globs,/*)
	allow jcr:read,rep:write,crx:replicate on /content/experience-fragments/wknd/us/en restriction(rep:globs,/featured)
	deny jcr:all on /content/experience-fragments/wknd/ca/en restriction(rep:globs,/*)
	allow jcr:read,rep:write,crx:replicate on /content/experience-fragments/wknd/ca/en restriction(rep:globs,/featured)
end

set ACL for AEM_ASSIGNMENT_USER_GROUP
	deny jcr:all on /content/cq:tags restriction(rep:globs,/*)
	allow jcr:read on /content/cq:tags restriction(rep:globs,/wknd-shared)
	deny jcr:all on /content/cq:tags/wknd-shared restriction(rep:globs,/*)
	allow jcr:read on /content/cq:tags/wknd-shared restriction(rep:globs,/activity,/region)
	allow jcr:read,rep:write,crx:replicate on /content/cq:tags/wknd-shared/activity
	deny jcr:all on /content/cq:tags/wknd-shared/activity restriction(rep:globs,/*)
	deny jcr:all on /content/cq:tags/wknd-shared/region restriction(rep:globs,/*)
	allow jcr:read,rep:write,crx:replicate on /content/cq:tags/wknd-shared/region restriction(rep:globs,/apac)
	deny jcr:all on /content/cq:tags/wknd-shared/region/apac restriction(rep:globs,/*)
end

set ACL for AEM_ASSIGNMENT_USER_GROUP
	deny jcr:all on /content/dam restriction(rep:globs,/*)
	allow jcr:read on /content/dam restriction(rep:globs,/wknd-shared)
	deny jcr:all on /content/dam/wknd-shared/en restriction(rep:globs,/*)
	allow jcr:read on /content/dam/wknd-shared/en restriction(rep:globs,/activities,/magazine)
	deny jcr:all on /content/dam/wknd-shared/en/magazine restriction(rep:globs,/*)
	allow jcr:read on /content/dam/wknd-shared/en/magazine restriction(rep:globs,/jcr:content,/skitouring)
	deny jcr:all on /content/dam/wknd-shared/en/activities restriction(rep:globs,/*)
	allow jcr:read on /content/dam/wknd-shared/en/activities restriction(rep:globs,/jcr:content,/cycling)
	deny jcr:all on /content/dam/wknd-shared/en/activities/cycling restriction(rep:globs,/*)
	allow jcr:read,rep:write,crx:replicate on /content/dam/wknd-shared/en/activities/cycling restriction(rep:globs,/jcr:content)
	deny jcr:all on /content/dam/wknd-shared/en/magazine/skitouring restriction(rep:globs,/*)
	allow jcr:read,rep:write,crx:replicate on /content/dam/wknd-shared/en/magazine/skitouring restriction(rep:globs,/jcr:content)
end

set ACL for AEM_ASSIGNMENT_USER_GROUP
	deny jcr:all on /conf restriction(rep:globs,/*)
	allow jcr:read on /conf restriction(rep:globs,/wknd,/wknd-shared)
	deny jcr:all on /conf/wknd-shared/settings/dam/cfm/models restriction(rep:globs,/*)
	allow jcr:read,rep:write,crx:replicate on /conf/wknd-shared/settings/dam/cfm/models restriction(rep:globs,/article/adventure)
end
